description.p: OpenSSL Encrypt is a comprehensive encryption tool that provides military-grade security with cutting-edge post-quantum cryptography. Protect your files against both current and future quantum computing threats.

ul.li: Multiple symmetric encryption algorithms (AES-GCM, ChaCha20-Poly1305, Fernet, etc.)
Post-quantum cryptography (ML-KEM, HQC, Kyber) for quantum-resistant protection
Advanced password protection with multiple KDF options (Argon2, PBKDF2, Scrypt)
Secure file operations with military-grade secure deletion
Comprehensive cryptographic hash support (SHA-3, BLAKE2b, Whirlpool)

description.p: Perfect for individuals and organizations requiring the highest levels of data protection, including protection against future quantum computer attacks.
To report bugs or request features, send email to: issue+world-openssl-encrypt-2-issue-+gitlab@rm-rf.ch
Release candidate 3 with comprehensive post-quantum cryptography support

ul.li: Added HQC (Hamming Quasi-Cyclic) post-quantum algorithm support
Enhanced ML-KEM integration with full NIST compliance
Improved keystore management for PQC keys
Comprehensive security documentation and algorithm audit
